thread.title: Watch: Yoo Ah In And Im Soo Jung’s Upcoming Drama Releases Short Yet Intense Teaser
thread.title_full: Watch: Yoo Ah In And Im Soo Jung’s Upcoming Drama Releases Short Yet Intense Teaser

author: uing
title: Watch: Yoo Ah In And Im Soo Jung’s Upcoming Drama Releases Short Yet Intense Teaser
text:
Pin   
tvN’s upcoming fantasy drama “Chicago Typewriter” (tentative title) starring Yoo Ah In, Im Soo Jung, and Go Kyung Pyo unveiled its first teaser. 
The drama shares the peculiar story about a best-selling author, a ghost who writes under his name, and the writer’s anti-fan. It is written by the screenwriter of “ The Moon Embracing The Sun ” and “ Kill Me, Heal Me ” and directed by the main director of “ On the Way to the Airport .” 
The voice in the teaser narrates, “Miraculous love that begins from an old typewriter,” raising people’s anticipation for the drama. 
Meanwhile, the drama recently began filming and will air in April after “ Tomorrow With You .”
